title.rendered: How Can I Find The Best Chimney Cleaners in My Area?

content.rendered:
When you are looking for people to take care of your home, it’s fundamental to do your due diligence and find the right people. You may have heard horror stories of homeowners either getting duped by fraudulent home improvement contractors, or being forced to pay a small fortune for less-than-mediocre quality work.

If you are Googling “chimney cleaners in my area”, you need to focus on companies that have a successful track record and glowing customer reviews. This goes without saying; the company must have good reviews online. If the majority of their customers’ testimonials are negative, that’s a major red flag.

But there’s more to hiring a chimney sweep than their online reviews. In this post, we have outlined some ways you can find the most reliable chimney cleaners in my area, who will take care of your home like it’s their own.

Do Your Homework When Choosing “Chimney Cleaners In My Area”

Chimneys, fireplaces, and vents need more regular maintenance than most other areas of your home. Chimneys usually need to be cleaned at least once a year (if not more), and will sometimes need to be repaired and renovated.

In other words, when you work with chimney cleaners in my area, you’ll probably want to work with them multiple times a year. So, look for a company that wants to build a long-term relationship with you, instead of just wanting to take your money. Here are a few ways you can find such a trustworthy company:

Cheap Service vs. Quality Service

There is no dearth of contractors who offer “full fireplace and chimney cleaning in $59” or some other similarly (ridiculously) low price. Does it seem too good to be true? You bet that’s what it is. It’s tempting to just compare the costs of all the “chimney cleaners in my area” and go with the cheapest option. But this can spell a world of danger for you and your family.

For starters, if chimneys and venting systems are not inspected and cleaned correctly, it increases the risk of fire accidents and carbon monoxide poisoning. If a chimney cleaner is cutting corners in taking care of your chimney or fireplace (that’s the only reason why their service is so cheap), they are putting your life at risk, period.

So, when you are talking to “chimney cleaners in my area”, make sure you ask them what kind of products and services they are able to provide at their quoted prices. 

Their Attitude Towards Customers

Let’s assume you have shortlisted two chimney cleaners in my area: A and B. “A” has a stunning website, amazing reviews, and they seem to know what they are doing.  “B” also seems like a judicious option even though their website doesn’t have that “expensive” look. However, their technicians seemed very warm and caring when you talked to them – so much so that they made a lasting impression on you.

Who are you more likely to hire? These intangible feelings are the hardest to quantify but they are almost always on the spot. 

Schedule A Chimney Inspection Today 

It’s worth the time and effort to find the right people to take care of your home’s HVAC system, chimney, fireplace, and ductwork. At United Home Service, we can take care of all your annual chimney inspection, maintenance, and repair needs. Our certified chimney sweeps are known for their dedication to their work as well as customers’ wellbeing. Call us at 866-847-7454 or contact us online to know more.
